line_1: When round the potter's wheel, their chins raising,
line_2: An urchin group in silent wonder gazing,

line_1: His eyes in extacy of wonder raising,
line_2: His glowing, throbbing heart thy goodness praising,

line_1: Even now perhaps, her dark hair raising,
line_2: At her casement she stands, o'er the waters she's gazing,
